00029 CSwordVerseKey::CSwordVerseKey( CSwordModuleInfo* module ) : CSwordKey(module) {
00030 }
00031 
00032 CSwordVerseKey::CSwordVerseKey( const CSwordVerseKey& k ) : VerseKey(k),CSwordKey(k) {
00033 }
00034 
00035 CSwordVerseKey::CSwordVerseKey( const VerseKey* k, CSwordModuleInfo* module) : VerseKey(*k),CSwordKey(module) {
00036 }

00039 CSwordKey* CSwordVerseKey::copy() const {
00040     return new CSwordVerseKey(*this);
00041 }
00042 
00044 CSwordModuleInfo* CSwordVerseKey::module( CSwordModuleInfo* newModule ){
00045     if (newModule && (newModule->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible || newModule->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary) ) {
00046         const QString& oldKey   = key();
00047         m_module = newModule;
00048         key(oldKey);
00049     }
00050     return m_module;
00051 }
00052 
00054 const QString CSwordVerseKey::book( const QString& newBook ) {
00055     int min = 0;
00056     int max = 1;
00057     
00058     if (!newBook.isEmpty()) {
00059         CSwordBibleModuleInfo* bible = dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(module());
00060         const bool hasOT = bible->hasTestament(CSwordBibleModuleInfo::OldTestament);        
00061         const bool hasNT = bible->hasTestament(CSwordBibleModuleInfo::NewTestament);
00062         if (hasOT && hasNT) {
00063             min = 0;
00064             max = 1;
00065         }
00066         else if (hasOT && !hasNT) {
00067             min = 0;
00068             max = 0;
00069         }
00070         else if (!hasOT && hasNT) {
00071             min = 1;
00072             max = 1;
00073         }
00074         else if (!hasOT && !hasNT) {
00075             min = 0;
00076             max = -1; //no loop
00077         }
00078                 
00079         bool finished = false;
00080         for (int testament = min; testament <= max && !finished; ++testament) {
00081             for (int book = 0; book < BMAX[testament] && !finished; ++book) {
00082                 if ( !strcmp((const char*)newBook.local8Bit(),books[testament][book].name ) ) {
00083                     Testament(testament+1);
00084                     Book(book+1);
00085                     finished = true;
00086                 }
00087             }
00088         }
00089     }
00090     if ( Testament()> 0 && Testament() <=2 && Book() <= BMAX[Testament()-1] )
00091         return QString::fromLocal8Bit( books[Testament()-1][Book()-1].name );
00092     return QString::fromLocal8Bit( books[min][0].name ); //return the first book, i.e. Genesis
00093 }
00094 
00096 const QString CSwordVerseKey::key( const QString& newKey ){ 
00097     if (!newKey.isEmpty()) {
00098         VerseKey::operator = ((const char*)newKey.local8Bit());
00099     }
00100     return QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)*this);//don't use fromUtf8 here!
00101 }
00102 
00103 void CSwordVerseKey::key( const char* newKey ){
00104     if (newKey) {
00105         VerseKey::operator = (newKey);
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 const bool CSwordVerseKey::next( const JumpType type ) {
00110     switch (type) {
00111         case UseBook: {
00112             if (Book() <= 0 || Book() >= BMAX[Testament()-1] && Testament() > 1)
00113                 return false;       
00114             Book(Book()+1);
00115             return true;
00116         }
00117         case UseChapter: {
00118             Chapter(Chapter()+1);       
00119             return true;
00120         }
00121         case UseVerse: {
00122         if (m_module && m_module->module()) {
00123             m_module->module()->SetKey(this);   //use this key as base for the next one!    
00124             (*(m_module->module()) )++;
00125             if (!m_module->module()->Error())       
00126                 key( QString::fromLocal8Bit(m_module->module()->KeyText()) );//don't use fromUtf8
00127             else {              
00128               Verse(Verse()+1);
00129               return false;
00130             }
00131         }
00132         else
00133           Verse(Verse()+1);
00134         return true;        
00135         }
00136         default:    
00137             return false;
00138     };
00139 };
00140 
00141 const bool CSwordVerseKey::previous( const JumpType type ) {
00142     switch (type) {
00143         case UseBook: {
00144             if (Book()<=1 || Book() > BMAX[Testament()-1] && Testament() > 1)
00145                 return false;
00146             Book(Book()-1);
00147             return true;
00148         }
00149         case UseChapter: {
00150             Chapter(Chapter()-1);
00151             return true;        
00152         }
00153         case UseVerse: {
00154         if (m_module && m_module->module()) {
00155             m_module->module()->SetKey(this);   //use this key as base for the next one!            
00156             ( *( m_module->module() ) )--;
00157             if (!m_module->module()->Error())
00158                 key( QString::fromLocal8Bit(m_module->module()->KeyText()) );//don't use fromUtf8
00159             else {
00160               Verse(Verse()-1);
00161               return false;
00162             }
00163         }
00164         else
00165             Verse(Verse()-1);
00166         
00167         return true;        
00168         }
00169         default:    
00170             return false;
00171     };
00172 };
